content:
# The furnace is currently out of fuel and has no ingredients to smelt, which explains why the smelting process failed.
# It appears that the furnace has only copper plates and no iron ore or fuel.

# To resolve this, I need to ensure that the furnace has both fuel and the necessary iron ore to smelt. 
# I will first add fuel to the furnace by inserting wood, and then I will insert iron ore for smelting.

# Insert wood as fuel into the stone furnace.
insert_item(Prototype.Wood, target=stone_furnace_entity, quantity=2)  # Add 2 wood to ensure it has enough fuel.

# Now, I will insert 1 iron ore into the furnace for smelting.
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, target=stone_furnace_entity, quantity=1)

# After inserting the iron ore, I will wait for the smelting process to complete.
for _ in range(30):  # Maximum 30 seconds wait.
    current_inventory = inspect_inventory(stone_furnace_entity)
    if current_inventory.get(Prototype.IronPlate, 0) >= 1:  # Wait until we have at least 1 iron plate.
        break
    sleep(1)
else:
    raise Exception("Smelting timeout for iron ore - please check resources.")  # Handle timeout if it occurs again.

# Once the smelting is complete, I will extract the iron plate to craft the assembling machine.
extracted_iron_plate = extract_item(Prototype.IronPlate, position=stone_furnace_entity.position, quantity=1)

# After extracting the iron plate, I will now craft the assembling machine.
craft_item(Prototype.AssemblingMachine1, quantity=1)

# Finally, I will check my inventory to confirm the items after crafting the assembling machine.
print(f"Inventory after crafting assembling machine: {inspect_inventory()}")
